Description: Red-slipped ware pottery bowl, 'Meidum bowl' type, with flaring body, drawn in beneath everted rim.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, p.296 [301].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1 Mar-Jun 1998. Ravenna. Museo Nazionale. 'Le origini Dell'Antico Egitto' 1 Sep 1997-London, Museum of Mankind, 'Pottery in the Making'.
